#go run main.go
lspSourceCursor main_template main.cpp 0
setenv offset stdout

lspRename main.cpp offset main3
contains stdout "int main3()"
lspRename main.cpp offset main4
contains stdout "int main4()"

-- main_template --
int main2();
int main() {
	int v1 = mâ—ain2();
	return 0;
}
int main2(){
	return 3;
}
